update `gs_purchase_order` set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, saler_id = #{salerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, wh_id = #{whId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.order_no as orderNo, b.CBCA08,c.CAUA09, d.CBSA08,e.CBWA09, a.order_date as orderDate, a.id, a.status as status FROM gs_purchase_order a LEFT JOIN CBCA b ON b.CBCA01=a.customer_id LEFT JOIN CAUA c ON c.CAUA01=a.saler_id LEFT JOIN CBSA d ON d.CBSA01=a.supplier_id LEFT JOIN CBWA e ON e.CBWA01=a.wh_id WHERE a.delete_flag=0 and a.order_no like concat('%', #{orderNo}, '%') and c.CAUA09 like concat('%', #{caua09}, '%') and d.CBSA08 like concat('%', #{cbsa08}, '%')
and date_format(a.order_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.order_date,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
order by a.order_date desc

SELECT a.order_no,b.CBCA08,c.CAUA09,d.CBSA08,e.CBWA09,a.order_date,a.id, f.goods_id,f.qty,f.price,f.remark,f.in_qty,f.change_qty,f.surplus_qty, g.CBPB08,g.CBPB15,g.CBPB12,f.id as relId,p.CALA08 FROM gs_purchase_order a LEFT JOIN CBCA b ON b.CBCA01=a.customer_id LEFT JOIN CAUA c ON c.CAUA01=a.saler_id LEFT JOIN CBSA d ON d.CBSA01=a.supplier_id LEFT JOIN CBWA e ON e.CBWA01=a.wh_id LEFT JOIN gs_purchase_order_detail f ON a.id=f.purchase_order_id LEFT JOIN CBPB g ON g.CBPB01=f.goods_id LEFT JOIN CALA p ON g.CBPB10=p.CALA01 where a.id = #{id}
